authmod.error: Something was wrong. Please contact the admins.
authmod.welcome: Use /register to sign up or /login to sign in.
authmod.wakeUp: Wake up, you have only %s seconds to log in.
authmod.banned: You've been banned. Please contact the admins.
authmod.login.usage: /login <email> <password> - Allows you to authenticate on the server
authmod.login.notFound: %s is not registered on this server.
authmod.logged.usage: /logged - tells you whether you are authenticated or not
authmod.login.wrongUUID: Wrong UUID. Please be sure you use the same UUID when you registered your account.
authmod.login.wrongUsername: Your username does not correspond to your credentials.
authmod.register.exist: Someone has already registered with this username.
authmod.register.usage: /register <email> <password> <password>- Be careful when choosing it, you'll be asked to login each time you play.
authmod.register.success: You are registered and authenticated, have fun!
authmod.register.wrongPassword: The password confirmation doesn't match. Please retry.
authmod.changepassword.same_password: New password should be different than the previous one.
